The home is a jewel, and the tasteful upgrades really are nice. We loved the stay, and will stay again when we're in town: our son has a small cottage a few blocks east, so it was so convenient to restaurants and everything. We loved the wonderful mix of classic and new (the kitchen and bathroom fittings for example, and the old room keys!). It's just beautiful inside, and it was a cozy place for us to have the kids visit Sunday afternoon and celebrate Christmas. Our small dog went for walks outside and she loved the large clover-like ferns we walked through and all the greenery, so unlike many hotels. The furniture was comfy, and the front bedroom bed was just luxurious! Sam & Stephanie were just wonderful to set us up on short notice, too!
We hope to stay again every time we visit Decatur. The combination of historic architecture, simple elegance and comfort, and excellent price-point make this a wonderful option to hotels where it's more difficult to bring our family dog. Upon arrival we were told we could check in early because of our flight arrival, than was nice but the cleaning person was there and would be til later in the day, odd. The bedrooms were nice, very comfy. No hand soap or tissues. The kitchen was satisfactory but no dish washer soap available. I don't mind hand washing but no dish drainer or dish sponges to wash with. I know you need mouse traps sometimes but NOT right on the kitchen counter. We couldn't get the heat or air to work so someone came out and the breaker was off outside.. not sure what was going on there.. so we tried to get the gas fireplace to turn on as stated in the description, and was told it isn't functioning right now. I don't think it has worked in a long time due to the several spider webs in the fireplace. In the evening I looked for an Xtra blanket in a hall closet found dirty damp towels and wash cloths. Pretty sure the cleaning person missed that... I looked for an extra towel and behold they were still in the dryer. I usually don't make a big deal about some things and yes I like to be a good host myself so these things bothered me. Bring your own ice too because non available with this fridge.
